title: Samsung yet to decide if Galaxy S6 will have full metal jacket | Trusted Reviews
description:
![Samsung Galaxy S6 MyKnox
leak](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**Samsung is yet to design on a final design for its forthcoming[Galaxy
S6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/samsung-galaxy-s6-review) handset,
according to new reports on Thursday.**

According to [AndroidPit](http://www.androidpit.com/galaxy-s6-news-metal-
unibody-case), the Korean firm is still debating whether to run with an all-
metal body for the flagship handset, or whether to roll out a part-metal
device with a plastic rear casing.

The report says Samsung has been showing off the all-metal prototype to select
folks at CES in order to get feedback on the design.

One of the caveats to going all-in on metal would be the iPhone-like inability
for users to replace the battery as they have in all previous models.

Given Samsung is expected to unveil the Galaxy S6 in March, it would seem a
decision about the decision about the design would have to be made pretty
quickly after the curtain down on CES.

AndroidPit has also received information claiming the Galaxy S6 will feature a
microSD card slot, a UV sensor, fast-charging, unidirectional microphones and
a UV sensor.

Today’s report isn’t the first this week suggesting the Galaxy S6 design is
still undecided

. Less than a week ago, we brought word claiming [multiple designs were still
being considered](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/multiple-
galaxy-s6-designs-still-being-considered) relating to a potential Galaxy S6
Edge.

[SamMobile](http://www.sammobile.com/2015/01/01/samsung-allegedly-testing-
multiple-prototypes-of-the-galaxy-s6-some-with-curved-edge-screens/) sources
claimed the firm is considering both single and dual-edge designs for a spin
off handset.

Would you like to see Samsung finally cast off the polycarbonate? Or do you
like to be able to switch out the battery without returning the phone to the
manufacturer? Let us know your thoughts below.

You can keep up with all the latest [Galaxy S6 specs and release date
rumours](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s6-release-date-
